name: Archives of Nethys 2E Simplified
description: Simplifies Archives of Nethys by removing excessive images and styles. Forces dark mode and uses muted tones. Focused on Pathfinder Second Edition and it might not work on the Starfinder or Pathfinder First Edition sections.
additional_info:
7/30/20 - updated to fix some light colors that were missed
5/16/20 - updated to ensure always dark and reduce clutter
9/3/19 - updated for latest aonprd update
